title: Thai Baht Rally at Risk as Central Bank Curbs, Elections Weigh
description: The Thai baht’s rally may be losing steam as the central bank steps up efforts to curb the currency’s strength and election risks reemerge, according to strategists.
content: The Thai baht’s rally may be losing steam as the central bank steps up efforts to curb the currency’s strength and election risks reemerge, according to strategists.
